constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

description: Submission of details required by condition 27A (Stage 1 Written Scheme of Investigation) of planning permission 15/13013/FUL Demolition of existing building and redevelopment of site to provide  B1 Use Class (Offices) at lower ground, ground and first floor levels and 10 apartments at second, third and fourth floor levels, with ancillary gymnasium at lower ground level
decision_conditions: The details submitted for the Condition 27A (Stage 1 Written Scheme of Investigation) of planning permission 15/13013/FUL by the applicant are considered satisfactory and the condition 27A is hereby fully discharged.

Any vehicular crossing must be constructed in accordance with the provisions of the Highways Act 1980 by the Service Director (Planning & Transportation) (Highways), Directorate of Environmental Services,Guildhall II, Kingston upon Thames.
Please provide existing roof plan at a recognised scale of 1:50 or 1:100, providing a scale bar, showing the outline of entire property not just part and showing dimensions of proposed work.
